title: Fantasy High
description: A modern fantasy teen adventure at Aguefort Adventuring Academy.

description: The Lord of Shadows is dead. What will his most trusted advisers do in this hour of darkness?

description: Seven student adventurers must face their greatest challenge yet - graduation.

description: Four monstrous students at Bram University face off against hormones, mysteries, and the most epic party in monster history.

description: It's a tough galaxy out there, but somebody's gotta live in it...it might as well be you.

description: In the world of the Neverafter, not all fairy tales have happy endings.

description: In an age before A Crown of Candy, the seeds of conflict began to take root - and soon, all of Calorum was enveloped in The Ravening War.

description: Welcome to Mentopolis - the city that exists only in your mind.

description: A family of stoats must sacrifice everything to survive in a harsh, cruel world.
